special_text:
[i](At the beginning of your upkeep, if you weren’t dealt combat damage since your last turn, put a brick counter on this outpost.)[/i]
When this outpost enters, return target Instant or Sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.
 2+ Bricks
You may pay {R}{G}{W}{U} rather than pay the mana cost of the first noncreature spell you cast each turn.
 3+ Bricks
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. You may cast a copy of that card this turn.
